cause.description:
As You May Know, Hip Hop Is A Target That The Media Loves To Hit...The Media Is Basically Against Hip Hop In Any Form And They Are TRYING To Destroy A Beautiful Culture...It's Not Just Music, It's A Way We Walk, Dress, Breath, And Eat..If U Love Hip Hop, Graffiti, Fashion, Etc, Etc, Show Your Support By Joining This Group!
1. Hip Hop Must Live
2. Hip Hop Is The Core Of The Music Industry, So Why Destroy It?
3. Hip Hop Is Life...Period
cause.mission: save hip hop from being attacked by the media and to resurrect hip hop in any form possible!
cause.name: Saving Hip Hop
